question: Which financial institution has introduced “Structured Finance and Partial Guarantee Programme” to NBFC-MFIs?
explanation:
The National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) has introduced a product Structured Finance and Partial Guarantee Programme to NBFC-MFIs.
This is intended to promote unhindered flow of credit in rural areas, which has been affected by COVID 19 pandemic. The product provides partial credit guarantee on pooled loans extended to small and mid-sized micro finance institutions (MFIs).
